attributes.action: Ban legal high before more people die
attributes.additional_details: I want to get legal high band we have no idea what is inside of this stuff and it is killing people and young people from the age of 11 are getting it and smoking it it's not meant for human consumption so why let shops sell it when they know fine well what there doing? It's highly addictive and also makes people aggressive they have to find money and they will find it by shop lifting pinching of people there family's and selling everything they get do you really want to find your brother son boy friend dead cause I know I don't! Please help and get this band it's for the best
